about_the_game:
Welcome to Sterling Heights...


Play as Jacob Stains, a young male with a troubled past. In Delinquent Community, the small town of Sterling Heights is filled with many drug dealers, drug addicts, criminals, hateful individuals, and gang members. As you explore the town, it is up to you how Jacob responds to situations with other NPC's. Jacob can choose peaceful or violent dialogue when interacting with certain NPC's.


  • Explore a small town, interact with residents, and learn about the life of Jacob Stains.
  • Main story line with side missions.
  • React to situations using peaceful or violent dialogue.
  • Combat system.
  • Gore system.
  • Use different types of weapons against NPC's that can be found throughout the map and be unlocked.
  • Random encounters with other residents from town.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains Drugs and Alcohol
Conversations about Drugs, Alcohol, and Violence
Blood and Gore

Suggestive Themes

name: Delinquent Community

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Welcome to Sterling Heights... Play as Jacob Stains and explore the town to learn about Jacob and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobs life, and optionally use violence against other residents.
